body_html:
Here is my new tutorial for Building Tensorflow 1.12 + CUDA 10.0 + CUDNN 7.3.1 + NCCL 2.3.5 + bazel-0.17.2 https://www.python36.com/how-to-install-tensorflow-gpu-with-cuda-10-0-for-python-on-ubuntu/, you will also get prebuilt wheel at last with AVX and compute capability 5.0.

I'm trying to build with the exact same configs but it keeps failing in the bazel build step. Can you provide a link to your prebuilt wheel?
